mapper.sql: task_no, subject_id, subject_type, name, source_type, cate_type, principal_uid, expect_workload, real_workload, custom_real_workload, plan_start_time, plan_stop_time, real_start_time, real_stop_time, status_code, suspend_state, create_user_id, pre_task_id, time_total, description, task_require, sla_code, priority_code, last_bug_group, opr_uid, opr_uname, last_submit_time, create_time, update_time, finish_description
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from task_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into task_info (task_no, subject_id, subject_type, name, source_type, cate_type, principal_uid, expect_workload, real_workload, custom_real_workload, plan_start_time, plan_stop_time, real_start_time, real_stop_time, status_code, suspend_state, create_user_id, pre_task_id, time_total, description, task_require, sla_code, priority_code, last_bug_group, opr_uid, opr_uname, last_submit_time, create_time, update_time, finish_description ) values (#{taskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{principalUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expectWorkload,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{realWorkload,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{customRealWorkload,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{planStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{planStopTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{realStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{realStopTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suspendState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preTaskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskRequire,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{slaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priorityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastBugGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oprUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oprUname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastSubmitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{finishDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update task_info
task_no = #{record.taskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subject_id = #{record.subjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subject_type = #{record.subjectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
